name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Super Special Party Time! ３Dお披露目！#Kiara3DParty [q3Z9dPHKS3Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Kiara shows off her 3D model and poses in a KFP restaurant setting with cardboard cutouts of her generation mates.
Kiara announces she will bring in 3D guests and prepares to change locations.
Interlude showing a KFP mascot bird and burger ingredients.
Kiara and Oozora Subaru perform the song "Tomodachi wa Tomodachi nanda!" at a stadium.
